file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE3【チラ見せ】 [3OkprzHcirU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Main waiting screen for hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony STAGE3.
Attention notice for visitors regarding flashing lights and cheering rules.
Chart showing the official penlight colors for each performing member.
A compilation of fan messages and illustrations supporting the hololive members.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: 声出し応援 OK です
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
